project.name: C-C771A-WIRE-03-ST03-DT07-DF15-CF24-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C771A-WIRE-03-ST03-DT07-DF15-CF24-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved .pcap file Read in a file containing a list of 10 other files. Open these files and read their contents. If these contents are purly alphanumeric, the memory gets properly free()'d, otherwise a missing reference is created.

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=60 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_8 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_8 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=60 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_9 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_9 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=60 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_10 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_10 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=60 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_1 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_1 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=60 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_2 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_2 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=60 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_3 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_3 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=60 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_4 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_4 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=60 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_5 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_5 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=60 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_6 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_6 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=60 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_7 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_7 generated\n'

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C771A-WIRE-03-ST03-DT07-DF15-CF24-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: export first 50 packets from saved pcap, run md5sum on newly created pcap Read in a file containing a list of 10 other files. Open these files and read their contents. If these contents are purly alphanumeric, the memory gets properly free()'d, otherwise a missing reference is created.

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=512 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_2_6 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_2_6 generated\n'

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
